verses.roman:
pratinandya tato devāḥ
prayujya paramāśiṣaḥ
sva-dhāmāni yayū rājan
brahmādyāḥ pratipūjitāḥ

synonyms: pratinandya—congratulating; tataḥ—thereafter; devāḥ—all the demigods; prayujya—having offered; parama-āśiṣaḥ—exalted benedictions; sva-dhāmāni—to their respective abodes; yayuḥ—returned; rājan—O King Yudhiṣṭhira; brahma-ādyāḥ—all the demigods, headed by Lord Brahmā; pratipūjitāḥ—being thoroughly worshiped (by Prahlāda Mahārāja).
translation: O King Yudhiṣṭhira, after all the demigods, headed by Lord Brahmā, were properly worshiped by Prahlāda Mahārāja, they offered Prahlāda their utmost benedictions and then returned to their respective abodes.
